titles.title: Mou Hitotsu no Doubutsuen: Zetsumetsu Doubutsu Monogatari
もうひとつのどうぶつえん ~絶滅動物ものがたり~

anime.description: A two-part OVA, featuring a documentary-like story, each about a one extinct animal: Mammoth and a Dodo.
